name: vcarpool
description: Carpool management application with TypeScript backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:fast: npm run build:shared && concurrently "npm run build:backend" "npm run build:frontend"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.analyze: cd backend && node -e "const CodeOrganizationManager = require('./dist/src/utils/code-organization.js').default; const manager = new CodeOrganizationManager('.'); manager.analyzeArchitecture().then(report => console.log(JSON.stringify(report, null, 2)));"

author: Ved Prakash Mishra
